title: 95/26/EC: Commission Decision of 8 February 1995 deferring, as regards the importation of fruit plant propagating material and fruit plants intended for fruit production from third countries, the date referred to in Article 16 (2) of Council Directive 92/34/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 February 1995 deferring, as regards the importation of fruit plant propagating material and fruit plants intended for fruit production from third countries, the date referred to in Article 16 (2) of Council Directive  92/34/EEC (95/26/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The date referred to in Article 16 (2), first subparagraph, of Directive 92/34/EEC is hereby deferred until 31 December 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 February 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 157, 10. 6. 1992, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 66, 10. 3. 1994, p. 31.
